hero.headline: Discover the Taste of
hero.subheadline: Move, Moreover! We transcend all boundaries, imaginable.

about.heroDescription1: Kagōunga began with a simple intention: to honor the rich flavors and timeless wisdom of the land we call home. What started as a humble effort to preserve local traditions has grown into a trusted name that stands for quality, authenticity, and heart.
about.heroDescription2: Along the way, we have marked many milestones, each one a reflection of our deep respect for culture and craft. From introducing our first creations to expanding into new innovations, our journey has always been guided by the same values: care, excellence, and a deep love for the stories behind every ingredient.
about.heroDescription3: Today, Kagōunga is more than a brand. It is a movement rooted in heritage, built with intention, and shaped by the people who believe that good food can carry meaning, memory, and connection.
about.valuesDescription: We strive to deliver the highest quality products while honoring the cultural significance of our food. Our commitment to authenticity, quality, and cultural preservation is at the heart of everything we do.
about.teamDescription: A dedicated team bringing the flavors of North Maluku to the world.
about.harvestingDesc: Sago is carefully harvested and thoroughly cleaned to ensure purity.
about.artisanDesc: Skilled artisans use traditional techniques to transform the sago into the smooth, gelatinous texture of Popeda.
about.qualityDesc: Each batch undergoes rigorous checks to maintain our high standards before being packaged and delivered.
about.commitmentQuote: At Kagōunga, every product is born from a sincere commitment to uphold quality, respect nature, and nurture trust. We work closely with local communities, responsibly source natural ingredients, and follow sustainable practices. To us, a product is more than its final form; it carries a story of people, culture, and conscious choices that create a positive impact on the earth and one another.
about.authenticityDesc: We honor the traditional methods and ingredients that define papeda, ensuring every bite offers an authentic taste of heritage.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We prioritize environmentally-friendly practices in our production process to benefit our community and the planet.
about.qualityValueDesc: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in our products, sourcing only the finest ingredients for an exceptional experience.
about.communityDesc: We believe in the power of community and work to support local farmers, artisans, and partners who share our passion for preserving cultural traditions.

privacy.pageSubtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data with the highest security standards.
privacy.section1Intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact our customer service. This information may include:
privacy.section2Intro: We use the information we collect to provide the best service to you, including:
section2Items: Processing your orders and payments accurately.
Communicating with you about products, services, and exclusive promotions.
Improving and personalizing your shopping experience on our platform.
Preventing fraudulent activity and maintaining system security.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We only share your information with trusted service providers who help with our business operations, such as payment processing and logistics.
privacy.section3Note: We implement strict technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
privacy.questionsSubtitle: Our team is ready to help answer your privacy-related questions.

terms.pageSubtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.
terms.intro: Welcome to Kagōunga. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you are not permitted to use our services.
terms.section1Intro: You agree to use this site only for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable laws. You are strictly prohibited from:
section1Items: Using the site for illegal or unlawful activities.
Interfering with or disrupting the integrity or performance of the site.
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems.
Copying or distributing content without written permission.
terms.section2Content1: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You are fully responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms.section2Content2: We reserve the right to refuse service, cancel orders, or terminate accounts if we believe that customer behavior violates applicable laws or harms our interests.
terms.productsContent: We strive to display colors and images as accurately as possible, but we cannot guarantee the accuracy of your screen's display.
terms.pricingContent: Prices may change at any time without notice. We reserve the right to cancel orders with incorrect pricing.
terms.section3Content: All content on this site, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of Kagōunga or its content providers and is protected by Indonesian and international copyright laws.
terms.needHelpSubtitle: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, feel free to contact us.
